main event: A female civilian reported seeing an unusual aircraft over Long Island that descended and maneuvered before disappearing on March 17, 1950.
interesting points: The aircraft appeared small at first before descending a few thousand feet,The observer described the aircraft as looking like two plates face to face,The aircraft dropped away from a smoke trail before hovering,The observer chose not to report the sighting to news agencies or local authorities, The event was documented as part of Project Blue Book.
